page.title: 16SCHOOLS
page.content: BRUNE PARK IS AN 11-18 COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL WITH 1476 PUPILS AND 89 TEACHERS. THE SCHOOL IS ORGANISED INTO SIX YEARS EACH WITH A YEAR HEAD AND A TEAM OF TUTORS WHO ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE WELFARE OF 30 PUPILS. THE SCHOOL DAY BEGINS AT 8.45 a.m. AND ENDS AT 3.35 p.m. IT CONSISTS OF OF FOUR LESSONS EACH LASTING 70 MINUTES. ALL STUDENTS IN YEARS 1-5 STUDY ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION. AS WELL AS HUMANITIES, LANGUAGES AND PRACTICAL SUBJECTS. EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES RANGE FROM THE DRAMA CLUB TO THE NEEDLEWORK CLUB. THE SCHOOL HAS TEN LABORATORIES, TWO LIBRARIES, A LANGUAGE LABORATORY AND TWO HALLS AS WELL AS ORDINARY CLASSROOMS. THE PHYSICAL EDUCATION AREA CONTAINS 2 GYMNASIA, A SWIMMING POOL AND HOCKEY, RUGBY AND FOOTBALL PITCHES.
